description.raw:
Moved the globals diff utility functions and implementation from [__main.py__](#!/monashspinor/runmanager/src/7f3022829ce83e639a971966a29194431fc1a945/__main__.py?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#__main__.py-1916) into __init__.py (not optimal, but it's where dict_diff & other utilities are). Turned these into general purpose functions globals_diff_groups (which accepts two sets of globals groups) and globals_diff_shots (which accepts filenames). These can be used outside of the GUI, for example globals_diff.py,
which can be added to the (right-click) 'Send to' menu on Windows by copying a
shortcut to globals_diff.bat in shell:sendto.
description.html: Moved the globals diff utility functions and implementation from main.py into init.py (not optimal, but it's where dict_diff & other utilities are). Turned these into general purpose functions globals_diff_groups (which accepts two sets of globals groups) and globals_diff_shots (which accepts filenames). These can be used outside of the GUI, for example globals_diff.py, which can be added to the (right-click) 'Send to' menu on Windows by copying a shortcut to globals_diff.bat in shell:sendto.

title.raw: Generalised globals diff implementation to permit command line comparison of two shot files
title.html: Generalised globals diff implementation to permit command line comparison of two shot files
